title: Attack on Titan
description: In a world where humanity lives within cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes wrong.

title: My Hero Academia
description: A boy born without superpowers in a world where they have become commonplace, but who still dreams of becoming a hero himself.

title: One Punch Man
description: The story of Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks a worthy opponent after growing bored by a lack of challenge.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A young man becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon.

title: Steins;Gate
description: A self-proclaimed mad scientist and his friends discover a way to send messages to the past, altering the timeline.

title: Your Lie in April
description: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after his mother's death discovers a free-spirited violinist who helps him return to music.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: A young boy sets out to become a Hunter, an elite member of society, in order to find his missing father.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: A former soldier becomes an Auto Memory Doll and explores the meaning of the words 'I love you' that her mentor told her.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: A ragtag group of bounty hunters chase down criminals across the solar system.

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the leader of his village.
